name: Use "type=" to select elements by type
description:
Using [type=xxx] is far faster because it can take advantage of the DOM querySelectorAll method in modern browsers. 
The check will be done on the following selectors 
:checkbox, :file, :image, :password, :radio, :reset, :text
This rule is compliant with CISQ OMG ASCPEM-PRF-04 recommendation.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Ensure using the "type=" annotation to improve the performance.
sample:
var input = $( "form input:radio" ); // Noncompliant 
 var input = $( "form :radio" ); // Noncompliant
total: Number of JQuery artifacts (Javascript source code containing JQuery)
